title: [Neuroscience] Chronic neurological conditions in childhood—such as migraine and epilepsy—may be associated with difficulties in social cognition skills. It shows importance of monitoring cognitive abilities in pediatric patients with migraine or epilepsy, in order to detect early impairment and ensure support.

[Health] Clinicians are calling for coping and social skills training and more extra-curricular activities in schools to help prevent increasing mental health problems in children, according to a new study
